page.title: 13Clubs in Fraserburgh
page.content: { Fraserburgh and district supports a {large variety of clubs and {organisations for all age groups: Royal British Legion: Inner Wheel Broch Community Centre: Speakers Club Ladies Lifeboat Guild: RAF Assocn. Union Grove OAP Club: WRVS Lifeboat Association: Ladies Circle League of Friends(Hosp):Junior Chamber Townswomens Guild: Round Table Deep Sea Mission: Rotary Club Toy Library: SWRI Businessmens Club: RSPB Ladies Speakers Club: Young Wives National Housewives Reg:Royal Navy Asc Junior Arts Society: Young Farmers Musical Society: Youth Clubs Amateur Theatrical Group:South Park CC {Charities such as Dr.Barnardo's, {Arthritis & Rheumatism, Spastics, {Mentally Handicapped, RSPCC, and the {Red Cross are also well supported.}
